Class ResolverOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.vertx.maven.ResolverOptions

  • public class ResolverOptions
extends Object
    Options to configure the resolver.
    Author:
    Clement Escoffier

    • Method Detail

      • getHttpProxy

        public String getHttpProxy()
        Returns:
        the configured proxy address for HTTP request, null if none.

      • setHttpProxy

        public ResolverOptions setHttpProxy(String httpProxy)
        Sets the address of the proxy used for HTTP requests.
        Parameters:
        httpProxy - the proxy address
        Returns:
        the current ResolverOptions instance

      • getHttpsProxy

        public String getHttpsProxy()
        Returns:
        the configured proxy address for HTTPS request, null if none.

      • setHttpsProxy

        public ResolverOptions setHttpsProxy(String httpsProxy)
        Sets the address of the proxy used for HTTPS requests.
        Parameters:
        httpsProxy - the proxy address
        Returns:
        the current ResolverOptions instance

      • getLocalRepository

        public String getLocalRepository()
        Returns:
        the path of the local repository. By default it's ~/.m2/repository.

      • setLocalRepository

        public ResolverOptions setLocalRepository(String localRepository)
        Sets the path to the local Maven repository. By default it's ~/.m2/repository.
        Parameters:
        localRepository - the local repository
        Returns:
        the current ResolverOptions instance

      • getRemoteRepositories

        public List<String> getRemoteRepositories()
        Returns:
        the list of remove repositories.

      • setRemoteRepositories

        public ResolverOptions setRemoteRepositories(List<String> remoteRepositories)
        Sets the list of remote repositories used by the resolver. The repository must use the Maven 2 repository layout. If you don't want to resolved from remote locations, set it to an empty list. By default it resolves from Maven central and Sonatype OSS Snapshots.
        Parameters:
        remoteRepositories - the list of remote repositories
        Returns:
        the current ResolverOptions instance

      • getRemoteSnapshotPolicy

        public String getRemoteSnapshotPolicy()
        Gets the remote snapshot policy.
        Returns:
        the remote snapshot policy.

      • setRemoteSnapshotPolicy

        public ResolverOptions setRemoteSnapshotPolicy(String remoteSnapshotPolicy)
        Sets the remote snapshot policy (`daily` by default). Accepted values are daily, never, always and interval:X where X is the number of minutes between two resolutions.
        Parameters:
        remoteSnapshotPolicy - the desired policy
        Returns:
        the current ResolverOptions instance
